short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll instagram followers and follow them by searching keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The goal of this extension is above all to be able to give more visibility to new or small Instagram accounts by allowing them to follow a certain number of accounts according to certain keywords defined by the user, he has the possibility to choose the number of accounts he wants to follow according to themes, words he has defined beforehand. And can easily unfollow some accounts automatically.
